message.body: Sofie would you help me? I think I have some misunderstanding with Kid >_<
What happened
I forward the email to you >_<
Didn't Get it yet
I ask Michael to send it because i ran out of my data plan. He just sent it. I feel so bad that I cannot express my idea correctly >_<
You know I'm not a puff style I just try to make it meaningful
Wait I'm reading it. I'm confused too
Oh, you didn't get the pic, I'm asking Michael to sent you the pic
So kid wants to name it different than u guys
What does he want to ca it
Yes
I don't get the exchange, though I think your email was elegant and clear. Did kid respond? I can't imagine anyone being upset with u for a second
We name it Braille Tutor but Kid wants Braille reader
He didn't reply yet >_<

I hope this doesnt overcomplicate things, especially bc u didnt ask my opinion but i like Braille reader, it sounds better, more serous. Plus it reads the Braille out loud. It may not be a reader, but it sure reads!
I stayed with Michael's at his place all night for debugging and modifying the prototype. Now on the train to the conference... So tired >_<
Ok, then we call it reader
Look u guys worked really hard I'm sure kid isn't upset he may be a little sensitive as he probably feels a little protective idea or something
Protective over the idea
You're native speaker you choose word better than I do
Honestly I don't think it makes such a difference
Haha
No I just always have opinions
I think kid might just be a bit testy. Your English is so good though sky that email was really well written
R you dreaming n English yet
Maybe I'm now in my dream because I slept only 3 hours on Saturday and 0 hour yesterday...
I do think I should adapt your opinion because I trust you:) You always hit the point
Ur a poet too sky. Id say it's a group of 3 what does Michael say
Have I ever told you the conference costs me $325 dollars?
Yes. So u have final say. That's the way America works sky... Cash is king, meaning money is power.
No I don't care about the name any more
What I want to say is : So expensive! And they don't provide lunch so I'm so hungry now... But the essays are amazing, i can't wait to share with you
Me2. Go feed yourself pretty lady!!!
They should provide lunch! It's $325 US Dollars! I'm too tired to walk out and get some food though
Haha ahhhh poor thing you'll def feel better if u eat though
The next session starts at 14:20, I'm going into the room. Thanks for spending your precious time talking to me, family <3
Fortunately I bring o'reos for myself! Yay!
